revision.text: ==Maltese== {{mt-root|x-w-q}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|mt|xtieq}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|mt|ar|اِشْتَاقَ|t=to long for}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|mt|/ʃtaːʔ/}} ===Verb=== {{mt-verb|jixtieq|mixtieq}} # to [[desire]], to [[wish]] # to [[want]] #: {{syn|mt|ried}} ====Conjugation==== {{mt-conj |1=xtaqt |2=xtaqt |3=xtaq |4=xtaqet |5=xtaqna |6=xtaqtu |7=xtaqu |8=nixtieq |9=tixtieq |10=jixtieq |11=tixtieq |12=nixtiequ |13=tixtiequ |14=jixtiequ |15=xtieq |16=xtiequ }}
